ListArtists.summary: Multiple artist objects with selected fields.

genre.description: The genre of artist you want listed.

event.description: The name for an event you want an artists listing for.

event_id.description: The unique identifier for an event you want an artists listing for.

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

incl_image.description: Decides whether or not an artist image is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

updated_since.description: Only retrive artists that have been added/updated since the given date.

GetArtist.summary: Fetch data about a single artist

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Artist you want full details for

incl_events.description: Decides whether or not a list of events the artists is performing at is included in the response.

incl_images.description: Decides whether or not an artist images are included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

GetArtistImage.summary: An artist image retrieved as either a JSON object or JPEG image.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Event you want an image for.

format.description: The format of the response you want back from the resource
